para: This supports uploading and downloading of waypoints and routes from Brauniger and Flytec flight recorders. These are integrated GPS, altimeter and variometer uints which are typically used by hang- and paraglider pilots.
The filename is the device name of the serial port to which the flight recorder is aattached, typically /dev/ttyS0 for serial ports and /dev/ttyUSB0 for USB-to-serial converters.
Download all the waypoints and routes from your flight recorder and convert them to GPX format:
Upload waypoints in CompeGPS format to your flight recorder:
The interface format is described in the Brauniger/Flytec communication definition document.
For downloading tracks in IGC format it is recommended to use tini which preserves the digitial signature generated by the flight recorder.
